trans-unit.source: Provides a control for viewing flow content, with built-in support for multiple viewing modes.
trans-unit.target: 提供檢視動態內容的控制項，並內建多種檢視模式的支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes, including a single-page (page-at-a-time) viewing mode, a two-page-at-a-time (book reading format) viewing mode, and a continuous scrolling (bottomless) viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> 包含可讓使用者以動態方式選擇不同的檢視模式，包括單一頁面 （頁面-一次） 檢視模式中，兩個頁面-a-次 （活頁簿讀取格式） 檢視模式，以及連續捲動 （無底邊） 的檢視模式的功能。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the ability to dynamically switch between different viewing modes, there are lighter-weight flow content viewers that are fixed in a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要以動態方式切換不同的檢視模式的功能，有輕量型流程固定的特定檢視模式的內容檢視器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> displays flow content in single-page viewing mode, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> displays flow content in continuous-scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> 顯示在單一頁面檢視模式中，非固定格式內容和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>連續捲動模式中顯示非固定格式內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information about available display modes, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>控制項，其預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-main.png "Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader")
trans-unit.target: ![包含圖說文字的螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-main.png "圖說文字的螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentReader")

trans-unit.source: **Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **內容區域**-內容區域顯示的內容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>所指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Document%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Tool Bar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area.
trans-unit.target: **工具列**-預設工具列停駐在內容區域下方。

trans-unit.source: It hosts controls for searching content, navigating pages, selecting a viewing mode, and changing the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 它裝載的控制項搜尋內容，巡覽頁面、 選取檢視模式，以及變更縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: **Find Button** - The **Find** button brings up a Find dialog, which enables the user to search the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> for specified terms or phrases.
trans-unit.target: **[尋找] 按鈕**-**尋找**按鈕會開啟 [尋找] 對話方塊，可讓使用者搜尋的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>指定的詞彙或片語。

trans-unit.source: The **Find** button is not shown if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.IsFindEnabled%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: **尋找**按鈕不會顯示如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.IsFindEnabled%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Find%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Find%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: **頁面導覽控制項**-頁面導覽控制項包括按鈕，以跳至下一個頁面 （向下箭號） 或前一頁 （向上箭頭），以及目前的頁碼和總頁數的指示器。

trans-unit.source: **Viewing Mode Buttons** - The viewing mode buttons enable the user to select from available viewing modes.
trans-unit.target: **檢視模式按鈕**-檢視模式的按鈕可讓使用者選取從可用的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.ViewingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.ViewingMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively.
trans-unit.target: **縮放控制項**-縮放控制項可讓使用者以增加或減少縮放層級，按一下加號或減號按鈕分別。

trans-unit.source: The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項也包括調整縮放層級的滑桿。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default toolbar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] does not include a **Print** button.
trans-unit.target: 預設工具列[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]不包含**列印** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is the only allowable child element for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> 是唯一允許的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> element can host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>項目可以裝載不超過一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> pictured in the preceding figure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>上述的圖中顯示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
trans-unit.target: 取消目前正在執行的所有列印工作。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值的值受限於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.MinZoom%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default Find dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: 預設的 [尋找] 對話方塊包含讓您輸入搜尋文字欄位，以及按鈕**找下一個**，**找上一個**，和**選項**。

trans-unit.source: The following Find options are provided by default:
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會提供下列的尋找選項：

trans-unit.source: Match whole word only.
trans-unit.target: 全字拼寫須相符。

trans-unit.source: Match case.
trans-unit.target: 大小寫須相符。

trans-unit.source: Match diacritic.
trans-unit.target: 比對讀音符號。

trans-unit.source: Match kashida.
trans-unit.target: 比對左右對齊。

trans-unit.source: Match alef hamza.
trans-unit.target: 比對引 hamza。

trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnInitialized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs" /> object containing the arguments associated with the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs" /> 物件，其中含有與 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> 路由事件關聯的引數。

trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: This method moves the focus to the content area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將焦點移至的內容區域的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> dependency property changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫每當<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>相依性屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> attached routed event reaches an element derived from this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 每當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> 附加路由事件到達其路由中衍生自這個類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on keystrokes such as input and command bindings will potentially handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke.
trans-unit.target: 依賴按鍵，例如輸入和繫結可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵, 的命令的其他程式設計功能。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the event handled, then <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.OnKeyDown%2A> will not be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入處理，然後將事件標記為系統功能<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.OnKeyDown%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Calling base() in your implementation is still recommended, in case an intermediate class in the inheritance implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 仍建議您實作中呼叫 base （），萬一中繼類別繼承中的實作這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You may call base() either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 可能呼叫 base （） 之前或之後，在特殊處理，根據您的需求。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須讓事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>無法選擇此路由上收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and mark the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並標示為已處理的事件。

trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print" /> 傳送的命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current number of display pages for the content hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 所裝載之內容的目前顯示頁數。

trans-unit.source: The current number of display pages for the content hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 所裝載之內容的目前顯示頁數。

trans-unit.source: Flow content does not have any inherent notion of a fixed number of pages; the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> are dynamically organized into a set of display pages, the number of which is based on current display and layout characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 非固定格式內容沒有任何固有的概念的固定數目的網頁。內容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>會以動態方式組織成一組顯示頁面，其中數目根據目前的顯示和版面配置特性。

trans-unit.source: For example, resizing a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> or changing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A> level affects the number of display pages that the content is organized into.
trans-unit.target: 例如，調整大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>或變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>層級會影響顯示頁面，將內容組織成數目。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode.Scroll> viewing mode, the page count and the current page number are always 1 (assuming any content has been loaded).
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode.Scroll>檢視模式，頁面計數目前的頁碼永遠是 1 （假設已載入任何內容）。

trans-unit.target: 取得選取之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 選取之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Selection%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Selection%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the text that a user has selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得使用者選取中的文字<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定會反白顯示選取之文字的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 反白顯示選取之文字的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定會反白顯示所選取的文字的筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A> property to pink, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A> property to 0.7.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A>屬性設為粉紅色，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A>0.7 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush" /> 的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush" /> 的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0.4。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A> to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A>為 0，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A>透明，看不到。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A> to 1.0 or greater, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A>為 1.0 或更高，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A>是不透明，而且所選取文字不可見。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A> property to pink, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A> property to 0.7.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionBrush%2A>屬性設為粉紅色，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity%2A>0.7 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SelectionOpacity" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode" /> values that specifies the desired viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode" /> 值，這個值會指定需要的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SwitchViewingModeCommand" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SwitchViewingModeCommand" /> 命令。

trans-unit.source: This method switches the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> to the specified viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會切換<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>到指定的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: For details on available viewing modes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的檢視模式的詳細資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the **Switch Viewing Mode** command.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 [切換檢視模式] 命令。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> class has built-in handling for this command (as well as built-in handling for a number of application and navigation commands).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>類別具有內建處理這個命令 （以及應用程式和功能的命令數個內建處理）。

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding and command binding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關命令和命令繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rather than initiate this command, you can instead call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SwitchViewingMode%2A> on the relevant <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>.
trans-unit.target: 而是比起始此命令，您可以改為呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SwitchViewingMode%2A>上相關<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>。

trans-unit.source: The result is the same.
trans-unit.target: 結果是相同的。

trans-unit.source: The **Switch Viewing Mode** command can either be parameterless, in which case the viewing mode advances to the next available viewing mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration sequence, or it can specify a viewing mode by naming the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand> command parameters.
trans-unit.target: **切換檢視模式**命令可以是無參數，在此情況下檢視模式將前移至下一個可用的檢視模式中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>列舉序列，也可以藉由命名指定檢視模式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand>命令參數。

trans-unit.source: If used to set a command property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the command must be parameterless.
trans-unit.target: 如果用來設定中的命令屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，命令必須是無參數。

trans-unit.source: You could also use or respond to this command in a derived class, using either the built-in handling or replacing it with handling of your own.
trans-unit.target: 您也無法使用，或回應在衍生類別中，此命令使用其中一個內建處理，或取代您自己的處理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.OnSwitchViewingModeCommand%2A> is a callback that you can use to change the class handling, without requiring changes to command bindings in the template or in instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.OnSwitchViewingModeCommand%2A> 若要變更的類別，您可以使用的回呼處理，而不需要變更範本中或在執行個體中的命令繫結。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode" /> values that specifies the desired viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode" /> 值，這個值會指定需要的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SwitchViewingMode(System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode)" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.SwitchViewingMode(System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode)" /> 命令。

trans-unit.source: For details on available viewing modes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的檢視模式的詳細資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Document" /> property to add a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument" /> as the content child for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Document" /> 屬性將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument" /> 加入為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 的內容子系。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the viewing mode for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> 的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode" /> values that specifies the viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode" /> 值，這個值會指定檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode.Page" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode.Page" />。

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes buttons for selecting the viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含選取的檢視模式的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the viewing mode selection buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示檢視模式選取項目上的按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>UI 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-viewmode.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode")
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentReader 的檢視模式](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-viewmode.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentReader 的檢視模式")

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> viewing modes, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>檢視模式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.ViewingMode" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.ViewingMode" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 目前的縮放層級 (以百分比表示)。

trans-unit.source: The default value 100.0 (zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100.0 (縮放層級 100%)。

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a zoom control that provides buttons for increasing or decreasing the zoom, as well as a slider for adjusting the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含提供按鈕，增加或減少縮放，以及調整縮放層級的滑桿縮放控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the zoom controls on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示縮放控制項上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>UI 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: ![FlowDocumentReader content zoom](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader content zoom")
trans-unit.target: ![FlowDocumentReader 內容縮放](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader 內容縮放")

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 縮放層級由的值限制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.MinZoom%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.MaxZoom%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定縮放增量。

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 目前的縮放增量 (以百分比表示)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increment of 10%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10.0 (縮放增量 10%)。

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 顯示比例增量是百分比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>層級會增加或減少時<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>執行命令，分別。

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a zoom control that provides buttons for increasing or decreasing the zoom, as well as a slider for adjusting the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含提供按鈕，增加或減少縮放，以及調整縮放層級的滑桿縮放控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the zoom controls on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示縮放控制項上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>UI 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: ![FlowDocumentReader content zoom](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader content zoom")
trans-unit.target: ![FlowDocumentReader 內容縮放](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader 內容縮放")
